root.common: <seelog minlevel="info"> <outputs formatid="common"> <rollingfile type="size" filename="../log/common.log" maxsize="20000000" maxrolls="5"/> </outputs> <formats> <format id="common" format="%Date/%Time [%LEV] [%File:%Line] %Msg%r%n" /> </formats> </seelog>
root.ces: <seelog minlevel="info"> <outputs formatid="ces"> <rollingfile type="size" filename="../log/ces.log" maxsize="20000000" maxrolls="5"/> </outputs> <formats> <format id="ces" format="%Date/%Time [%LEV] [%File:%Line] %Msg%n" /> </formats> </seelog>
root.assistant: <seelog minlevel="info"> <outputs formatid="assistant"> <rollingfile type="size" filename="../log/assistant.log" maxsize="20000000" maxrolls="5"/> </outputs> <formats> <format id="assistant" format="%Date/%Time [%LEV] [%File:%Line] %Msg%n" /> </formats> </seelog>
